  • Method Details

    • isSideProtected

      public boolean isSideProtected(ComponentSide side)
      isSideProtected() checks if a certain side is protected by the shield
      Parameters:
      side - is the side that we want to make sure is protected
      Returns:
      true if the side is actually protected, false otherwise

    • protectedSides

      public List<ComponentSide> protectedSides()
      protectedSides() returns a list containing the two protected sides

      rotateClockwise() handles the rotation by calling the superclass method and then handles the switching of the protected sides
